    • Method Detail

      • addSetting

        public void addSetting(SettingKey key,
                       Object value)
        Adds a setting to the Castle environment
        Parameters:
        key - The name/key of the setting. This is an enum of type SettingKey
        value - The value of the setting

      • updateSetting

        public void updateSetting(SettingKey key,
                          Object newValue)
        Updates the setting with key to the new value
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the setting to update
        newValue - The new value for the variable

      • settingExists

        public boolean settingExists(SettingKey key)
        Determines if a setting exists in the Castle environment
        Parameters:
        key - The name/key of the setting
        Returns:
        True if the setting exists in the Castle environment

      • deleteSetting

        public void deleteSetting(SettingKey key)
        Deletes a setting from the Castle environment
        Parameters:
        key - The name/key of the setting to delete

      • getSettingValue

        public Object getSettingValue(SettingKey key)
                       throws InvalidSettingKey
        Gets the Object value for a key
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the setting
        Returns:
        The corresponding value of the key
        Throws:
        InvalidSettingKey - If the key does not exist in the setting
